# Download and save data from websites

```{r}
library(repmis)
urladdress <-"http://data.worldbank.org/data-catalog/GDP-ranking-table"
urladdress2 <-"http://data.worldbank.org/data-catalog/ed-stats"
GDP <- repmis::source_data(urladdress)
EDU <- repmis::source_data(urladdress2)
names(GDP)
str(GDP)
names(EDU)
str(EDU)
```
